rules.name: Service Organization Name
rules.description: Extract the service organization name from the report and verify it EXACTLY matches the expected name. The names must be identical - even minor differences in spelling, capitalization, or punctuation should result in failure.

rules.name: Audit Period
rules.description: Extract both the start date and end date of the audit period from the report. Verify that BOTH dates EXACTLY match the expected dates. Even if the meaning is the same (e.g., '1 Jan' vs 'January 1'), they must match the expected format and values precisely.
rules.input_format: start_date and end_date (e.g., January 1, 2025 and June 30, 2025)

rules.name: Report Type Classification
rules.description: Extract the exact report type from the document (must explicitly state SOC 1 or SOC 2, and Type I or Type II). Verify it EXACTLY matches the expected report type. Be very strict - do not infer or assume the type.
rules.input_label: Expected Report Type (e.g., SOC 2 Type II)

rules.name: Report Specificity
rules.description: Determine if the report is generic (for multiple users) or user-entity specific (for a particular organization). Verify it matches the expected specificity.
